item.description:
Hey Salsa Fans:

Join me for a fun saturday salsa dancing with the Masacote Dance School.  They are offering free classes and it will be a great time to learn and ask all questions you've been thinking about.  It will be a great time and like always, I will be wearing my fedorat hat so you can find me.  I'll be waiting near the entrance at 12:00 to greet you at the door and will go in and take the classes when they start at 12:00.

 

Here are the detail:

"SAT, Sept 22nd! 12:30-4:00pm

FREE SAMPLING of ALL our Fall classes! MEET the staff! Learn what we are all about!

* FIRST 5 PEOPLE GET A FREE DVD!
... ** Door Prizes offered each hour THROUGHOUT the day!
*** 10% DISCOUNT ON OCTOBER MONTHLY CLASSES FOR NEW STUDENTS WHO SIGN UP AT THE OPEN HOUSE!!!

Current Student? Bring a new friend to classes and you each get 20% off for the month!

BRING YOUR FRIENDS for Raffle Prizes, Finger Food, PERFORMANCES, & Dancing!

We hope to see you there!

*****************************
Visit Website for DETAILED Schedule!
http://www.masacote.com/fall2012openhouse
*****************************

Schedule for The Masacote School's FREE Open House
DOORS OPEN AT 12:30PM!

Everyone is welcome!

12:30pm Welcome & Check In

1:00-2:00pm NEW CUBANIZATE PROGRAM HOUR

Cuban Salsa & Rueda, Different Levels, with Metamovements
Latin Percussion, Different Levels, with Joel Masacote

2:00-2:30pm PERFORMANCES! MEET & GREET THE STAFF

2:30-4:00pm MASACOTE SALSA & MOVEMENT CLASSES

Movement Classes, Different Levels with Masacote
NY Style Salsa On2 Footwork & Partnerwork, Different Levels, with Masacote

4:00pm PRACTICE; MIX & MINGLE

*****************************
Visit Website for DETAILED Schedule!
http://www.masacote.com/fall2012openhouse
*****************************

Location:
The Masacote School @ CAC;
215 First St; Cambridge, MA 02128
Convenient Kendall Square Location; Free Parking   See you there   -Angel
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a b;ack Fedora hat and will be standing near the entrance

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: FREE FALL OPEN HOUSE at The Masacote Dance School!
